item.title: GPD Pocket, a very small but yet powerful laptop
item.author: Auteur
item.description: Let me present you my latest gadget, the GPD Pocket a full HD 7" quad core laptop, with 8GB RAM and 128GB storage. It runs Windows 10 and more importantly (to me), it also runs Linux! Quick specs Intel AtomÂ® x7-Z8750 Processor (quad core) 8GB RAM 128 GB storage (eeprom based) 7000 mAh battery (12 hours announced battery life) FHD 7" touch screen (1920x1200) Look and usage I love the look!
